reference.shortdesc: The delim element identifies a character that marks the beginning or end of a section within a syntax diagram.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Typical delimiter characters are the parenthesis, comma, tab, vertical bar or other special characters.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The delim is specialized from ph. It is defined in the syntax diagram domain module, which is a specialization of the programming domain module.

example.title: Example
example.p: In the following code sample, the delim element specifies that the equal sign (=) is used to mark the end of the group sequence.
